AgendaItems.Title: Confirmation of draft Minutes of the 36th BoG Meeting
AgendaItems.Details: Modified minutes incorporating comments of Shri S. P. Goyal were confirmed.

AgendaItems.Title: Actions on decisions of 34th and 35th BoG meetings
Remittance of Annual subscription to AIU, New Delhi
AgendaItems.Details: Payment not required as per statutory provisions in NITSER Act.

AgendaItems.Title: Ratification of engagement of Dr. Debasish Bhattacharya as Registrar (i/c)
AgendaItems.Details: Board ratified the Chairperson’s decision to assign Registrar (i/c) duties to Dr. Debasish Bhattacharya until further orders, subject to ongoing Writ Appeal outcome. Recruitment process for regular Registrar to proceed with approval from Chairperson.

AgendaItems.Title: Appointment of Regular Chief Vigilance Officer (CVO)
AgendaItems.Details: Board noted Ministry's recommendation. Dr. Paritiosh Bhattacharya will continue as CVO until further orders, supported by Legal Cell.

AgendaItems.Title: Payment of Honorarium to Associate Deans and Registrar (i/c)
AgendaItems.Details: Special Allowance of Rs. 2500/month to Associate Deans approved. No allowance for Registrar (i/c) considered. Emphasis on recruiting full-time Registrar.

AgendaItems.Title: Constitution of Tribunal of Arbitration under Section 29 of NITSER Act
General Provident Fund Rules for NITA employees
AgendaItems.Details: Draft GPF Rules to be vetted by Govt. of India. Reminder to MHRD for concurrence. Board confirmed implementation.

AgendaItems.Title: EPF facilities to contractual employees
AgendaItems.Details: EPF contribution rate capped for pay above Rs. 15,000. Legal advice recommended; proposal to Chairperson for consideration. Board confirmed implementation.

SubItems.Title: A. Organizing in-house conferences, training, seminars
SubItems.Details: Board permitted use of TEQIP-II funds for conferences, R&D programs, pedagogical training, and Continuing Education Programs.

SubItems.Title: B. Honorarium for Invitee Professors
SubItems.Details: Rs. 5000/day (besides TA/DA) allowed for Professors from IITs, NITs, and other institutions for lectures under TEQIP-II Fund.

SubItems.Title: C. Screening Committee for TEQIP-II International Travel
SubItems.Details: Director authorized to constitute Screening Committee with external experts. Process to be streamlined with MHRD.

AgendaItems.Title: Upgradation of internal main road and ratification of Chairperson’s decision
AgendaItems.Details: Board noted road widening and infrastructure upgrade details. Accepted recommendations of 34th and 35th BWC meetings.

AgendaItems.Title: Fees for students from academic year 2016-17
AgendaItems.Details: Tuition fees for B.Tech. revised from Rs. 70,000 to Rs. 125,000 per annum with concessions for socially/economically backward students. Existing fees retained for other programs and previously admitted students. Decision confirmed for immediate implementation.
